name: Crumbling Castle
description:
[Made for Dev Squad Jam: Replicate - 'The Last Night']

Don't let your buddy get hit as you make your way through the crumbling castle! (Telling a story through gameplay/music... sorta)

Controls:

  • WAD  - to hold your buddy in the corresponding direction
  • Arrow Keys - to move

I spent to much time trying to work with the sound so I didn't have any time to make any graphics... So, no actually castle can be seen crumbling xD
